name: lets crash and burn: a story about debt and loan forgiveness
name_original: lets crash and burn: a story about debt and loan forgiveness
description:
lets crash and burn: a story about debt and loan forgiveness is an adventure game developed by lovvipop. It was originally released in 2023.
You can play lets crash and burn: a story about debt and loan forgiveness on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
